Label: All
Definition: Summary of all courses regardless of institution

Label: Sender Only
Definition: Summary of all courses at sending institution (or recorded as if they were taken at the

Label: Transfer Only
Definition: Summary of transfer work (courses taken at other than the sending institution)

Label: All Not Repeated
Definition: Summary of all courses except for repeated or forgiven courses/credits

Label: Sender Not Repeated
Definition: Summary of all courses at sending institution except for repeated or forgiven courses/credits

Label: Transfer Not Repeated
Definition: Summary of transfer work except for repeated or forgiven courses/credits

Label: Carryover Credit
Definition: Summary from offline records and used as the intitial point for cumulatives and averages

Label: Degree Applicable
Definition: Summary of course that apply to degree

Label: Non Degree Applicable
Definition: Summary of courses that do not apply toward degree

Label: Converted From
Definition: Summary of credits before an institutional term-basis conversion, such as from quarters to semesters

Label: Converted To
Definition: Summary of credits after an institutional term-basis conversion, such as from quarters to semesters

Label: Weighted
Definition: Summary that gives additional (higher) value to specific courses taken by a student, such as honors courses, International Baccalaureate, Advanced Placement, high school /college dual enrollment.

Label: Non Weighted
Definition: Summary that does not give additional value to courses, regardless of special characteristics of the courses. For example, if the grading scale is from 0 to 4.00, then it is not possible to have a summary higher than 4.00.

Label: Academic Summary Types
Definition: Summary Type is an indication of what is being summarized over which period of time.
